@rica (Time: 60mins)

Hi Vivian,

Just jumping in for Chris, he is off sick to day.

We have updated the staging.

We have created custom post type "pdf" this is where all the links will be stored.
To add a new universal link:
  • Add new pdf then set the title
  • Set the "PDF-LINK" then publish

https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=pdf

https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/pdf/pds/
https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/pdf/aig/
https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/pdf/tmd/
https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/pdf/fsg/

Also "/pdf/" can be change to your liking, Let me know if this works for you?
